title: Curry Garden Pea Soup
ingredients: ['125ml vegetable or chicken stock', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '300g frozen garden peas', '1 celery stick, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons freshly chopped mint', '125ml milk', '125ml double cream', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'freshly chopped mint to garnish']
